meanings.sent1: The beauty of the sunset was incomparability to anything I had ever seen before.
meanings.sent2: Her talent for painting was truly incomparability among her peers.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to swim in the pool was an incomparability hilarious sight.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak stood in incomparability majesty against the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the exotic fruit was an incomparability experience for my taste buds.

meanings.definition: Not able to be equated with anything else.
meanings.sent1: The feeling of love for a child is incomparability to any other emotion.
meanings.sent2: The value of friendship is incomparability and cannot be replaced.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's attempt to fly was an incomparability amusing sight.
meanings.sent4: Her voice soared in incomparability beauty during the opera performance.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's dedication to training was an incomparability example of hard work.
